channel.title: Error?
channel.description:
Help guys, I got this error while running my server.
Richscape server is successfully online and running, created by Rich. _____________________________________________________________________
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 17 at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:295) at ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:37) at server.main(server.java:29) [jgoguen5]: jgoguen5 is already online. [jgoguen5]: jgoguen5 is already online.

item.title: Error?
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

Adding to STR’s post, make sure to use tabs in item.CFG

Read full topic

item.title: Error?
item.dc:creator: @xstrxpurez xstrxpurez
item.description:
@xstrxpurez wrote:

did u mess up in the item.cfg ? if so correct what u did… and if not then make sure its loading the file items or item.cfg in the itemhandler…

Read full topic

item.description:

Help guys, I got this error while running my server.
